item.title: HackTheBox Writeup: Bashed
item.description: As a career blue teamer I feel it’s important to understand the tools, techniques, and thought processes of an attacker. The best way to learn is by doing, and one of my favorite ways to practice is HackTheBox. The machine named Bashed was recently retired so walkthroughs for it have been popping up everywhere. This one is mine. Recon As usual with a HackTheBox target system, all you have at the onset is a name and IP address.
